articles.title: 4 dividends, 1 bonus issue: These stocks will turn ex-date in the week Dec 5-9 | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Generally, an ex-date is when the price of an equity share of a company gets adjusted for the dividend payout or bonus issuance. Some of these stocks are multi-baggers, while some have given double-digit returns year-to-date.
